segments.text: Looking into this kitchen, I notice the woman polishing her plate so diligently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wearing an apron and dress, looking every bit the busy homemaker.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh no, the sink is overflowing right in front of her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is cascading down onto the cabinets and floor like a waterfall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea, her back is turned slightly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are up to mischief behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on that wobbly stool, reaching into the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilting backward, he could fall any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing there, hand out, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sneaking treats without mom knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a calm garden, what a contrast to this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off that faucet before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just asking for trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
